name: The ODM-Probe for On-Demand Monitoring
short_description: The project is meant for the further development of a Traffic Flow Monitoring Probe whose design and operational principles are defined by a Traffic Flow Monitoring Paradigm dubbed the ODM-Paradigm. ODM-Probe integrates modified Net-SNMP/Ethereal modules
